text: And if they see that the offender be worthy of stripes, they shall lay him down and shall cause him to be beaten before them. According to the measure of the sin, shall the measure also of the stripes be.

segments.text: And if they see that the offender be worthy of stripes, they shall lay him down and shall
cause him to be beaten before them.
According to the measure of the sin, shall the measure also of the stripes be.
